body_content.explanation: used to describe something that is ready for you to take quickly when you do not have much time, or to describe the activity of taking things quickly like this:
examples: They sell grab-and-go meals ranging from burritos to Asian chicken salad.
I am building up a grab and go bag in the event of an emergency when I need to leave the area quickly.
The drink container is a new packaging concept designed for the grab-and-go generation.
